scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Christ on the cross at the center. To the left, the Virgin Mary, clad in a blue mantle, is shown with hands clasped in prayer, surrounded by other grieving figures. To the right, a man on a white horse, adorned with a red and gold saddlecloth, observes the scene, accompanied by other figures. In the background, a city with towers and buildings is visible. The ground is rendered with green hills and foliage. The overall scene is set outdoors, under a blue sky.
